pageContext.claim: “They were going to take over our country. If I didn't come along, they would've taken over our country. What they did to Obama and Biden -- they ripped off this country. Hundreds of billions of dollars a year going into China, and nobody said anything. They didn't even talk about it.”
pageContext.analysis: China was not going to take over the United States if Trump lost the 2016 election. And he is once again giving false depictions of how trade works. U.S. consumers purchase more Chinese goods than vice-versa. That's all there is to the trade deficit. The Chinese also buy hundreds of billions of dollars in U.S. goods.
